project.description:
Following API: -suiteName, -configName, -firmwareVersionMain, suiteName - name of the predefined suite, e.g. Sanity440Lync_basic configName - name of the predefined session config, e.g. Sanity440LyncConfig firmwareVersionMain - name of the firmware file which should be test, e.g. UC430HD_2.0.3.16 1. Before running, put a firmware version to \\isr0214-34401\firmwares (isr0214-34401 = 10.59.0.87) , also it is need to put relevant firmwares for other phones. If tested firmware is UC440HD_3.0.0.65, it is need also to put all other available firmwares: UC430HD_3.0.0.65, UC420HD_3.0.0.65, UC405_3.0.0.65 (note that for 405 ther is no 'HD' in firmware name); 2. Example for run: tclsh AtaExec.tcl -configName Sanity440LyncConfig.ACDev.tcl -suiteName Sanity440Lync_basic.suite -firmwareVersionMain UC440HD_3.0.0.65.img
Should work on 10.59.1.46 - ippAuto

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: ConfigName
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Sanity or Full - The name should be Sanity440LyncConfig.ACDev.tcl or Full440LyncConfig.ACDev.tcl

hudson.tasks.BatchFile.command:
curl -s http://ippauto/index.php/status/show.xml > show.xml type show.xml type show.xml | findstr status.free./status if ErrorLevel 1 Exit 1
IF NOT EXIST z: ( net use z: /DELETE net use z: \\10.59.0.87\Firmwares )

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!c:\cygwin\bin\bash --login -i
if curl -s http://ippauto/index.php/status/show.xml | grep -q status.busy./status; then exit 1 fi
ARTIFACTORY=https://artifactory/api/storage/ipp-release/com/ac/ipp/SFB/$BuildRelease DOWNLOAD=$(echo $ARTIFACTORY | sed 's|api/storage/||')
if [ "$LASTBL" = "None" ]; then LASTBL=`curl -ks -X GET $ARTIFACTORY | grep uri | cut -d'"' -f4 | grep -v https | cut -c 2- | sort -Vr | head -1` fi echo Find: $LASTBL
if [ "$BuildRelease" = "3.0.1" ]; then BoardsList="440HD 430HD 420HD 405HD" else BoardsList="450HD 445HD 440HD 430HD 420HD 405HD" fi
for BOARD in $BoardsList; do echo Searce $ARTIFACTORY/$LASTBL/$BOARD/UC${BOARD}_$LASTBL.img... if curl -ks -X GET $ARTIFACTORY/$LASTBL/$BOARD | grep -q $LASTBL.img\"; then echo -- Check if UC${BOARD}_$LASTBL.img exist in z: if [ ! -f z:/UC${BOARD}_$LASTBL.img ]; then echo ---- Download UC$BOARD_$LASTBL.img to z: curl -ks -X GET $DOWNLOAD/$LASTBL/$BOARD/UC${BOARD}_$LASTBL.img --output z:\UC${BOARD}_$LASTBL.img else echo ---- z:/UC$BOARD_$LASTBL.img already exist.. skip the download... fi # else # echo Not exist in Artifactory: $ARTIFACTORY/$LASTBL/$BOARD... # fi done
if [ -f z:/UC${model}_$LASTBL.img ]; then echo tclsh AtaExec.tcl -configName ${ConfigName}${model}LyncConfig.tcl -suiteName ${ConfigName}${model}Lync_basic.suite -firmwareVersionMain UC${model}HD_${LASTBL}.img cd C:/IpPhoneAutomation/ModifeidIterations/ATA tclsh AtaExec.tcl -configName ${ConfigName}${model}LyncConfig.tcl -suiteName ${ConfigName}${model}Lync_basic.suite -firmwareVersionMain UC${model}HD_${LASTBL}.img fi
